title: Which is characteristic of autistic children

content.question: Which of the following is typically cited as a characteristic of autistic children?

choices.label: Minor developmental delays in academic achievement
Above-average performance on tests of creativity
Paranoia comparable with that experienced in schizophrenia

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
